item.title:
“The movie industry is changing so much. It’s a different era now and it’s getting crazier with the streamers. I fear a little for the storytelling of it all. I think there will be less good storytelling and a lot more product out there.” - Channing Tatum
https://variety.com/2023/film/news/channing-tatum-fears-streaming-less-good-storytelling-more-product-2-1235629098/…

item.title:
“After I met Eva, I realized that I just didn’t want to have kids without her. And there were moments on The Place Beyond the Pines where we were pretending to be a family, and I didn’t really want it to be pretend anymore.” - Ryan Gosling for GQ
